content.title: Intro
content.content:
1924
Preceded by
1924
1925
Year
1926
Followed by
1926

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1925.

content.title: January
content.content:
5 - Wolfe Morris, who would voice of Gollum in the 1968 radio series of The Hobbit, is born.
? - J.R.R. Tolkien's "Philology: General Works" is published in The Year's Work in English Studies.

content.title: April
content.content:
23 - Sir Gawain and the Green Knight is first published.
? - "Some Contributions to Middle-English Lexicography", an essay by J.R.R. Tolkien, is published.

content.title: June
content.content:
6 - Actor Gareth Jones is born.
8 - Father Robert Murray, friend of J.R.R. Tolkien and his family, is born.
12 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to a Mr. Ashton.
27 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 7.
? - Tolkien's poem Light as Leaf on Lindentree is published in The Gryphon.

content.title: July
content.content:
22 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 8.
22 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to H.F.B. Brett-Smith.
? - The Devil's Coach-Horses, an essay by J.R.R. Tolkien, is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
8 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to H.F.B. Brett-Smith.
23 - The first recorded date in the writing of the Lay of Leithian, at Line 557.

content.title: October
content.content:
21 - Tolkien submits his resignation from Leeds, his employment officially ended December 31, 1925.
29 - Paul Daneman, who would voice Bilbo Baggins in the 1968 radio series of The Hobbit, is born.

content.title: December
content.content:
23 - Rayner Unwin is born.
25 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.

? - Tolkien moves from Leeds to Pembroke College of Oxford where he is elected Rawlinson and Bosworth Professor of Anglo-Saxon.
? - The Flight of the Noldoli from Valinor is published.
? - The journal The Transactions of the Honourable Society of Cymmrodorion Session 1923-24, which includes an essay with a contribution by J.R.R. Tolkien as translator, is published.
? - Author and academic Charles Moorman is born.
Years
1922 1923 1924 1925 1926 1927 1928
